order.hint_text: Click the button "Get order" below to make a purchase in the sequential order.

success_modal.description: You can see the record on the order page

purpose:
Allows members to earn rebates by inviting friends and family to join. Give others a unique invitation code to receive additional rebates and invitations from invited committees.

Invitation card
Invitees must be Wayfair Silver, Gold, Platinum or Diamond members. Invitees must fully comply with these Terms and Conditions in order to participate in the Wayfair Agency Partnership Program.

Basic Instructions for Participating in the Program
When relatives and friends use your invitation code to register a Wayfair account, you have participated in the Wayfair agency cooperation program, and you fully and unconditionally agree to these terms and conditions, as well as Wayfair's decision and interpretation. These decisions and interpretations shall be final and binding on all matters related to the Program.

invite
Invitation codes can be used to sign up for friends and relatives. When friends and relatives scan the invitee's invitation code, they will become the invitee's primary agent. Wayfair agents can get the commission share of the agent in three levels, and the part beyond the three levels cannot be divided into commissions.

Commissions and Examples:
Member a (invitee) invites member B (invitee and new member) to purchase on their behalf. At this time, member A (invitee) will receive 16% of member B's commission. Member B's invitation code invites member C. At this time, member B will receive 16% of member C's commission, and member a will receive 8% of member C's commission. commission. In this case, Member C invites Member D, Member C will receive 16% of Member D's commission,
8% of Member D's commission, and 4% of the commission earned by Member A when participating in the Wayfair Agency Partnership Program All tertiary housekeeping services generated are from Wayfair and do not affect members' personal income.

Disclaimer
The commissions and rewards obtained by invited members will be distributed within 24 hours after the customer service staff has reviewed and approved them. Invitees can view the commissions and rewards earned by invited members in "Funding Details". The terms and conditions contained herein are subject to change or modification at any time. Your continued participation in the program means that you accept any changes or modifications to these terms and conditions. If you find fraudulent or other related behaviors such as registering an account with the same identity, multi-account arbitrage, etc., including but not limited to the above examples, you reserve the right to warn or warn in the process of inviting members. Freeze your account. Wayfair's Agency Partnership Program is run by Wayfair,

Company support project
When you perform well during your cooperation with the company, the company will spend money to open your own Wayfair subsidiary for you and become the national Wayfair chief in your location. And presented a car as a reward, according to individual performance.

The final interpretation right belongs to Wayfair
